content: अविरल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Thick, dense; °वारिधारा <ls>U. 6</ls> sharp-driving shower; °अश्रुबिंदु; not thin, many; सादरमभिमुखदत्ताविरलपदः <ls>K. 95.</ls> {@--2@} Contiguous, close. {@--3@} Coarse, gross, substantial. {@--4@} Uninterrupted, continuous. --लं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Closely; अविरलमालिंगितुं पवनः <ls>Ś. 3. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Uninterruptedly, incessantly, constantly; <ls>U. 3. 24.</ls>
